KloudsUserIdentifier.Description: A temporary ID used to refer back to the user that requested this in app, do not change.

ConnectorPrincipalId.Description: The principal that is allowed to assume this role, do not change.

ConnectorExternalId.Description: The external id used to match the connector when assuming this role, do not change.

ConnectorEndpoint.Description: The endpoint to send the role arn to when complete so kloud.io can assume this role, do not change.

KloudsConnectorRoleArn.Description: Role used by klouds.io to read resources

Description: Generates Cost and Usage Reports and creates a cross-account IAM Role with READONLY access for use by klouds.io
